item.title: clipping isssues with the tram tracks in blast pit
item.dc:creator: ghostboy1225
item.description:
setpos 3707.885742 3294.966797 -831.102356;
is the location there is some clipping issues with the tracks here that can allow props to fallout of the world. (this unexpected behavior is coming from the same area and afterwards)
when hopping along randomly the player starts walking on gravel instead of the tracks and the metal sounds is replaced by the gravel sound
